483551522.author: a TripAdvisor user
483551522.reviewBody: This is wonderful port and small town that is a mix of old Mexico, but with a tourist freindly touch taking the best of Mexico- clean beaches with a variety of very secluded to a few more, high end eateries as well as \'cheap\' joints, clean amenities.  Shopping is a bit of same same but more laid back.  Lovely spot to walk around and walk the small boat marina.  Enough to keep a cruise boat passenger on a budget entertained for the day.

483435952.name: BEAUTIFUL
483435952.author: a TripAdvisor user
483435952.reviewBody: This is the most breathtaking view I have seen in many years. I was not expecting to be taken aback the way I was, but I am glad to have experienced this bay.

480979017.name: Pristine Natural Beach
480979017.author: a TripAdvisor user
480979017.reviewBody: We arrived at the Beach very early in the morning and it was so calm and natural.  As the morning progressed more people came to the area.  It was the weekend so there were many locals enjoying family time.  The restaurants along the beach were accommodating and enjoyable.  The vendors traversing the beach with various wares and eats were polite and non intrusive.  I wanted to take ALL the fresh fruit home with me!  In another couple weeks there will be green trees surrounding the bay.  Hope to get back again soon to paddleboard and see the coral.

480750100.name: Nice safe beach
480750100.author: a TripAdvisor user
480750100.reviewBody: Easy access a good place to enjoy a beach day , can be busier on weekends, restaurant is also on site

480225124.name: Beautiful
480225124.author: a TripAdvisor user
480225124.reviewBody: Huatulco Bay is quite beautiful. Not only is the beach a delight to walk but also the views are great. The rocks and the cliffs make it quite special.

479851645.name: Wow!!
479851645.author: a TripAdvisor user
479851645.reviewBody: I came here for a visit and I have stayed for 3 years now. It is a precious gem - part of me wants to share it and another part of me doesn\'t because it is perfect just the way it is now.\n

477488877.name: Loved DREAMS in Huatulco
477488877.author: a TripAdvisor user
477488877.reviewBody: Wide variety of food, some entertainment,  Enjoyed the peacefulness. The children were all young. Not many teenagers.\nEveryone happy at pool or ocean

476500896.name: awesome area, BAD HOTEL at BARCELO
476500896.author: a TripAdvisor user
476500896.reviewBody: Barcel\u00f3 at Huatulco had staff that only seem to help you if you tipped them.  small amenities for the people staying there.

472976471.name: Beautiful area
472976471.author: a TripAdvisor user
472976471.reviewBody: People are friendly and helpful. Scenery and weather were beautiful...would travel there again  in a heartbeat

472959875.name: Beautiful and exceptional
472959875.author: a TripAdvisor user
472959875.reviewBody: This place is quite, beautiful, and safe. My husband and I had a great time and would love to be back ASAP.

470399798.name: So beautiful
470399798.author: a TripAdvisor user
470399798.reviewBody: We did the 7 bay tour, we just booked through our hotel the tour, left at 10 am and returned about 5 pm. We took a smaller boat that fits about 30 people. Lunch on the private beach was very good

470185904.name: Dreams resort
470185904.author: a TripAdvisor user
470185904.reviewBody: The best place we\'ve been so far. So clean, great food, amazing staff and a calm serene setting. We are definitely planning on returning.

469695285.name: Beautiful beaches and headlands
469695285.author: a TripAdvisor user
469695285.reviewBody: Huatulco is built on a series of bays, divided by bluffs and rocky outcrops.  Many different choices for swminning and snorkelling.  Most of the beaches have good restaurants.  For the price of a couple of drinks, or a little food, they will let you occupy a table with umbrella for hours.  Take a boat tour if you can but watch the wind forecast.  The weather is always hot and sunny at this time of year, but the wind can really kick up on occasion, forcing the boat operators to curtail the tours.

469623392.name: If you like the heat this is the place
469623392.author: a TripAdvisor user
469623392.reviewBody:
The scenery in the bays is beautiful with cliffs surrounding clear water.
In most spots the dropoff is quite steep and water tends to have fair sized waves.
The whole area is very clean, restaurants are reasonable and the food is very good.
There are an abundance of taxis at 30 pesos anywhere around Crucecita and Santa Cruz. There will always be one waiting for you to hop in.
See the churches and watch the weavers. Enjoy a cold Horchata or helados at the pastelerias.

467446449.name: great little snack area to but lunch and alcohol on an outing and even splash around in the gentle waves on the beach.
467446449.author: a TripAdvisor user
467446449.reviewBody: The resort was a pure Dream Come true as all your needs were granted from room 24 hour service to a 24 hour coffee and snack facility on the second floor just a few feet from the bar.

467138728.name: Cruise ship visit
467138728.author: a TripAdvisor user
467138728.reviewBody: Small bay with a beach cafes and shops. A good place to visit not sure if I could spend a week here as only a small beach although not overcrowded when we visited. A nice stop off point.

466372037.name: A peace of tranquility
466372037.author: a TripAdvisor user
466372037.reviewBody: This is our third year to vacation in Haultuco.  We love that this part of Mexico seems not as touristy as other parts.  The people here are genuine and want to know more about where we are from.  \nThe beaches are beautiful and so are the bays.  \nWe love this part of Mexico.

466319445.name: The beautiful Santa Cruz Bay
466319445.author: a TripAdvisor user
466319445.reviewBody: I can not tell how beautiful this bay really is words can not describe and how hard the people work to make a living if you travel alot you must stop at this beauty.

465845856.name: Just a Day There but would like to return
465845856.author: a TripAdvisor user
465845856.reviewBody: We were on a cruise and just spent a day here and toured most of the bays. This is a nice newer planned city. It is also very eco friendly as that the power is all green based. We spent the day on a catamaran with some swimming. It is a smaller more laid back feel than Cabo, PV or Cancun and being I am told the newest planned resort development the building are all pretty new. It is also pretty far south so hot to me but most of Mexico is that way.

465130802.name: Gorgeous
465130802.author: a TripAdvisor user
465130802.reviewBody: The sunrise is beautiful over the bay. We loved watching the waves, the fishing boats, and a cruise ship.  The water isn\'t too cold, though the waves are quite strong.  Love it here.

463341593.name: Bar service
463341593.author: a TripAdvisor user
463341593.reviewBody: I would like to call out a couple of waiters that were just incredible.\nMayren Cabera in the Lobby bar and Marcial Maya Cruz at the pool. these two kept us entertained and fully hydrated. \nThanks

463275454.name: one week stay
463275454.author: a TripAdvisor user
463275454.reviewBody: Park Royal has a wonderful beachfront location that is just a short cart ride away from the hotel. The beach there is beautiful and scenic. If is located in a small bay and was not very busy.

463197361.name: Beautiful view
463197361.author: a TripAdvisor user
463197361.reviewBody: View amazing this was Bay view from Behring building. They had a couple. Hairs out on overlook too. We watched a snorkel dive for oysters here

461590388.name: Seems to be a Canadian hideaway Americans have not discovered
461590388.author: a TripAdvisor user
461590388.reviewBody: Huatulco is Mexico the way it used to be.  This is a sunny, beach driven town that tourists have missed.  You don\'t need a car, taxis are cheap and plentiful. Canada has found this resort, but not many Americans, give it a try.

461428338.name: Lots to see but busy
461428338.author: a TripAdvisor user
461428338.reviewBody: We took a private boat (Roberto "Pulpo" Lavariega) through 6 of the bays and stopped to snorkel at this one. There are all types of marine life here. The bay seems quite protected from the current which makes it easy to hold over one area without being tossed around. Keep in mind it\'s a very popular spot for the big tour companies so when they show up it gets very busy very quickly.

460171218.name: Snorkeling
460171218.author: a TripAdvisor user
460171218.reviewBody: We snorkeled with one of the tours from the hotel and found some amazing vibrant colored fish.  Not only was the snorkeling great, we say three whales, some dolphins and several sea turtles.

460052618.name: beautiful quiet beaches
460052618.author: a TripAdvisor user
460052618.reviewBody: Huatulco beaches are always clean and quiet. The water is an excellent temperature making it very nice to stay in for a long time.

459318365.name: Pristine beach
459318365.author: a TripAdvisor user
459318365.reviewBody: Traveled there by boat and did enjoy a swim and snorkel.  Beach was great for sunning and walking.  Really lovely view.

458167727.name: Beautiful!!
458167727.author: a TripAdvisor user
458167727.reviewBody: Huatulco is simply lovely.  My stay was soured by the horrible hotel I stayed at the first nights (La Isla Huatulco) but aside from that horrible hotel, Huatulco is paradise.

457181947.name: Heaven
457181947.author: a TripAdvisor user
457181947.reviewBody: the water is always warm and crystal clear.  I love the waves, am a good swimmer and have never had a problem swimming . The snorkeling is great as well, lots of fish

456520530.name: Cruise Ship Visit
456520530.author: a TripAdvisor user
456520530.reviewBody: We arrived it Huatulco Bay with no expectations. We were quickly blown away by how clean everything was and the general ambience of the town.  Lots to see and do, and all the pricing in the restaurants and shops was very reasonable.  We will be back for sure.

456450262.name: Fun
456450262.author: a TripAdvisor user
456450262.reviewBody: Great experience to snorkel and swim in the bay. Water had a great temperature- just right. Snorkelling wood be better done at a virgin location. Not much to see and has been pick over.\nGreat just to float and enjoy life. No current!!!

455039935.name: beautiful location
455039935.author: a TripAdvisor user
455039935.reviewBody: Waves can be a bit challenging but it is a beautiful venue. The beach has lovely soft sand.  You can walk for quite a while along the beach and get a good workout!

454366290.name: Excellent snorkelling and beach walking
454366290.author: a TripAdvisor user
454366290.reviewBody: Had a private boat tour for four from marina at Santa Cruz Huatulco - C$100 for 5 of the 9 bays... recommend Bruno Osuna (cel: 958 106 4356); good English, took about 4.5 hours... one of our highlights!!

454003968.name: Zip lining
454003968.author: a TripAdvisor user
454003968.reviewBody: See your sunwing rep and he ill set you up my Wife never had done it better but she would go again came back to hotel bubblling

453592439.name: Friendly with lots to see
453592439.author: a TripAdvisor user
453592439.reviewBody: Scenic, laid back and quieter than some of the more trendy tourist sites. Learned a lot about the Mexican country and their economy. We also learned about their eco-friendly initiatives.

452158464.name: Beautiful sunrises, sunsets
452158464.author: a TripAdvisor user
452158464.reviewBody: Just enjoyed walking along the beach. Beautiful! You can feed the fish right at your feet towards the east end of the beach. Kids loved it!

451740917.name: Beautiful
451740917.author: a TripAdvisor user
451740917.reviewBody: The bays are worth seeing take the tour up them and enjoy the food on the beach and snorkeling if you like.

451705962.name: Take a tour boat to see the bays of Huatulco
451705962.author: a TripAdvisor user
451705962.reviewBody: Touring the bays of Huatulco by tour boat is a must for all visitors.  Each bay is beautiful and unique!  A variety of tour boats leave the Huatulco marina at 10:30 am and cost about 350 pesos. There are larger boats that are party boats and play music and serve drinks.  We took a smaller boat that offered wonderful snorkeling in the national park (for 130 pesos) and ended at playa San Agustin.  On the way back to the marina our boat was followed by three playful dolphins.  We also saw sea turtles and jumping manta rays from the boat.   It was by far the best day we had during our short stay in Huatulco.

450786796.name: Beauty scenery
450786796.author: a TripAdvisor user
450786796.reviewBody: We took a taxi to some scenic overlooks of the bay and were glad we did.  There are many shops and a beach very close to the pier.

450529213.name: Relaxing on the beach
450529213.author: a TripAdvisor user
450529213.reviewBody: Very crowded but beautiful bay. After canyoneering on the river with Christian, we spent the day using free wifi, drinking margaritas and enjoying the sun.

449393425.name: Loved the Bay tour
449393425.author: a TripAdvisor user
449393425.reviewBody: We loved the bay tour - we were on one of the smaller boats which I really liked - some of the boats hold like 100 people. I would pick one that had smaller amount of people. We went with a company Paraiso Huatulco

449253520.name: Local beach
449253520.author: a TripAdvisor user
449253520.reviewBody: If you like a beach with lots of locals this is for you. Good restaurants all around lots of parking taxis available.

448707287.name: Beautiful and safe
448707287.author: a TripAdvisor user
448707287.reviewBody:
Some people were asking me how safe this place is, when I got home.
VERY safe. We had no problem at all. 

We got up early most of the mornings to go out to see the sunrise.at Huatulco Bay.     Fantastic view!
My favourite activity is to walk down through the streets and watch the chirping birds fly from tree to tree.
I recommend to use sun tan lotion even in the morning. As soon as the sun is out, it has strength.
Make sure you take your camera with you.

447480050.name: Safe Place and amazing beaches
447480050.author: a TripAdvisor user
447480050.reviewBody: Huatulco Bay Is a safe little city with gougeaus ifrastructres, very green ecologist place. You can find luxory stay or easy way and economic stay. The beaches are many and different with clear water. From there you can also reach waildest place like Zipolite and Mazunte so Mexican beaches with a lot of foregins living there.

447248774.name: Gorgeous untouched beaches
447248774.author: a TripAdvisor user
447248774.reviewBody: Most beaches in Huatulco area are untouched and uninhabited. Nary a highrise or large hotel in sight. Gorgeous clean sand and warm water.

446511767.name: A nice visit
446511767.author: a TripAdvisor user
446511767.reviewBody: A very cheerful place to be visited by couples or families or friends, to enjoy the beach and sun, but take care because also you ll find some high waves

443897560.name: Awesome ocean views
443897560.author: a TripAdvisor user
443897560.reviewBody: Whether you are into beach-coming, snorkeling, sun worshiping or just plain relaxation this is the beach for you. Always something to see while doing nothing. Weather is always amazing.

434162789.name: Love \u2764\ufe0f
434162789.author: a TripAdvisor user
434162789.reviewBody: Wonderful all the way around ,staff were so present helpful.food was wonderful .THis is a little hidden gem .They are the reason we have tryed other dream. Honestly it\'s been very difficult to find the same quality of services

431965016.name: Huatulco
431965016.author: a TripAdvisor user
431965016.reviewBody: Beautiful place to visit!! We had an amazing time snorkeling, fishing, boating, kayaking and swimming!

431919898.name: Blue, blue clear water!
431919898.author: a TripAdvisor user
431919898.reviewBody: Beautiful bay, uncrowded, pristine beaches. Snorkeling was fun, lots to see.  The water was warm and inviting.

429452263.name: So pretty!
429452263.author: a TripAdvisor user
429452263.reviewBody: So nice and quiet and the beaches are just like that in the Caribbean.  Felt very safe in Huatulco and it is extremely clean.

427232677.name: Mesmerizing
427232677.author: a TripAdvisor user
427232677.reviewBody: The rough sea did not take away the beauty of this pristine bay in Huatulco.  Great for walking and sunbathing without a lot of people.

426451692.name: 8 bays in all - some private
426451692.author: a TripAdvisor user
426451692.reviewBody: beautiful beaches - clear surf - warm waters - you have the beaches to yourself most of the time - off season - maybe Christmas time it\'s crowed -

418056581.name: Great views of the different Bays
418056581.author: a TripAdvisor user
418056581.reviewBody: Great experience! incredible people and views. We saw turtles and dolphins. Food a little bit expensive on the entrega beach

417692720.name: Spectacular and superclean beaches
417692720.author: a TripAdvisor user
417692720.reviewBody: Can\'t beat Huatulco\'s jungle scenery, exceptional beaches and glorius golden sand. Superclean and many certified as such.

407492338.name: Amazing view of the ocean, the bay and cliffs, blanketed in the distance by lush mountains.
407492338.author: a TripAdvisor user
407492338.reviewBody: Just because you stay at a resort, doesn\'t mean it has to be on a strip that has been leveled for tourism.  This area truly is an eco tourist spot.  Huatulco has taken great care to leave as much nature as possible in tact, leaving the area thick with greenery and teaming with wildlife.

405726479.name: Awesome Bay
405726479.author: a TripAdvisor user
405726479.reviewBody: Very nice and clean bay for you to enjoy like a champ, would recommend a lot of sunscreen and some beach towels, don\'t forget a beach umbrella as there very few places with shade.

403903490.name: Beautiful sights
403903490.author: a TripAdvisor user
403903490.reviewBody: On our way to the bay tour we encountered a school of dolphins playing in the ocean. A rare treat. On our way back we were treated to a sighting of a manta ray. Beautiful waters to snorkel in.

398426571.name: Beautiful, quiet, clean and no crowds. The beaches and water are clean and scenic. Great place to step off the world.
398426571.author: a TripAdvisor user
398426571.reviewBody: Beaches are not crowded and are very clean as well as the water. Snorkeling, fishing, bay tours to secluded bays for swimming are great. Local cuisine is excellent and the national park ensures it will not turn into Cancun or Acapulco. Mexico did this place right. Evening walks in town are pleasant.

395660798.name: Not Cancun!
395660798.author: a TripAdvisor user
395660798.reviewBody: I love Huatulco! We\'ve visited it many times over the years and although at times it gets crowded, it never feels like a touristy town. It helps that the main hotels are not near the main town and mainly isolated with vegetation.\nPrices tend to be much lower that any other resort town in Mexico, the ocean is pristine and people are super friendly.

388278557.name: Unexpectedly -- paradise!
388278557.author: a TripAdvisor user
388278557.reviewBody: We were in Huatulco for just about 6 hours on a cruise stop.  It\'s not surprising that the beautiful Huatulco bay is the number 1 "attraction" in this area.   This place was unexpectedly beautiful and we both decided  that we\'d come back in a minute given the opportunity.  It was fairly quiet and and not spoiled by large crowds.  We had an excellent lunch with coconut shrimp and margaritas and headed back to the ship.  Perfect day!

381283558.name: Great waves
381283558.author: a TripAdvisor user
381283558.reviewBody: This is a gorgeous beach, the waves were great, we went there to surf, not sure about swimming, ocean looked a bit rough. Saw sting ray family, with dotted skin simply beautiful! Clean, nice courteous people, vendors not pushy, very nice place to chill.

380496156.name: A nice place to relax and drink margueritas
380496156.author: a TripAdvisor user
380496156.reviewBody: Our cruise ship was only there for a few hours so there was only time for a few drinks, some guacamole and a swim.  A relaxing few hours.

379224513.name: Beautiful Sights
379224513.author: a TripAdvisor user
379224513.reviewBody: Very Beautiful, quiet and peaceful. We love the beach and the Hot sunny days! We enjoy the food and people are very nice.

378821189.name: perfect place for R &R
378821189.author: a TripAdvisor user
378821189.reviewBody: The beach is so pretty and the snorkeling area is right there. Don\'t need to rent a boat. The sand is raked and clean, wonderful chaises and umbrellas with thatched roof huts.

378019661.name: Simply beautiful
378019661.author: a TripAdvisor user
378019661.reviewBody: Beautiful blue water, clean and perfect temperature, quiet and safe,, hot and humid in May, but not unbearable.

377046724.name: Paradise
377046724.author: a TripAdvisor user
377046724.reviewBody:
We wish to thank all  the staff for making our stay so enjoyable
we cannot think of a place where the people were so friendly a
helpful we recomending your hotel to all we meet and hope that
we are able to return again.

376284189.name: So cool to see
376284189.author: a TripAdvisor user
376284189.reviewBody: Took boat tour through the bay, and get to see everything from cruise ships to family fishing boats.  Lots of fun!!!

374637622.name: Natural beauty
374637622.author: a TripAdvisor user
374637622.reviewBody: The Huatulco area has a number of bays, all outstanding and a little different. Some have nothing, just a beach. Others have restaurants, boating, swimming, all the way up to the main bay where the cruise ships dock and you can rent a panga and go fishing, snorkeling, whatever you like.\n\nWe have been there twice for just a day, and hope to make it a destination for a future vacation.

372423090.name: Unspoiled Mexico
372423090.author: a TripAdvisor user
372423090.reviewBody: This is my favorite place to visit when I come to Mexico.  Nice sand beaches with the mountain backdrop behind you.  Best of all very few tourists.  Try the Camino Real resort very nice.

372215195.name: A Real Gem--Nice Sand Beaches
372215195.author: a TripAdvisor user
372215195.reviewBody: We have been to Huatulco Bay 5 times now, staying at the All Inclusive Resorts located on this bay. The beach is a long stretch of about a kilometre long. It varies from sloping to relatively flat in front of the Barcel\u00f3 and Dreams hotels. The water is always very warm for swimming and ocean activities like kayaks, snorkeling, sailing or paddle boards. We will be back again this fall/winter.

370248245.name: Warm Water, No Crowds...forget Cabo
370248245.author: a TripAdvisor user
370248245.reviewBody: Everything I wanted in a resort experience without the resort feel.  Fabulous water.  Open air restaurants right on the beach.  And lots of charm in the town of La Crucitas which is a $2 cab ride away.  HIgh on my list of warm weather places to return to.

370197306.name: Great Mature area to visit!
370197306.author: a TripAdvisor user
370197306.reviewBody: If your looking for a party place don\'t go here!  It\'s a great place to enjoy culture, nature and a mature party.  We enjoyed having a good time, good resturants and culture and locals.  Not at all like some Party locations of Mexico.

369398207.name: Beautiful
369398207.author: a TripAdvisor user
369398207.reviewBody: This place is so clean and peaceful. We loved snorkelling and seeing at the cool different fish. Secrets was really good as they provided a lot of free activities to explore :)

368760742.name: Amazing place with so many great beaches
368760742.author: a TripAdvisor user
368760742.reviewBody: There are so many great areas and beaches in Huatulco. We never got to see all of them so we will have to go back soon. My Wife and I got to know an excellent cab driver that drove and guided us to several places. We recommended Edgar Escobar, our driver and guide, to other people we met in the Huatulco area. They could not believe the great service he gave. Edgar speaks perfect English and Spanish which comes in handy when you need a translator. He\'s really kind of like a Guide but a lot cheaper. I would highly recommend Edgar Escobar for all you taxi, tours and any help you need in the Huatulco area. Edgar can be contacted at 1-958-589-2052. Call him in the daytime as he does not get cellular service at his home in the evening. We would just get our hotel front desk to call him.

368760663.name: gorgeous water front, bays were amazing! loved the resort, fanatistic!
368760663.author: a TripAdvisor user
368760663.reviewBody: loved the resort, the service, the rooms, food! Everything was GREAT! nothing bad to say about any of it! the staff were awesome & very attentive!

367432632.name: An Amazing new Destination!
367432632.author: a TripAdvisor user
367432632.reviewBody:
We have been frequent vacationers all over Mexico over the past few years and decided to try this region. All we can say is 'wow'!

Beautiful area - Mountains, beach, rainforest - all in one area.
We stayed in a AI on the beach and absolutely loved it.
The people were the best part, extremely friendly, warm and inviting. The town was very quaint and bustling with a lot of interesting things to see/do.
Since you are closer to the equator, it is much warmer here that most Mexican destinations (mid 90s all week in March), but we did find it actually less hot than Cabo san Lucas, for example. The ocean breezes kept it comfortable almost all the time.
the beach was great - fairly steep into the water, so the waves were pretty big most days, even if it wasn't rough on the water. made for a great time for kids to lay in the water. The rip from the waves is pretty strong however, so keep that in mind.

Fantastic restaurants and bars in town as well.

365848852.name: Very Cabo Like
365848852.author: a TripAdvisor user
365848852.reviewBody: Huatulco has a very Cabo feel in that it shares a similar coastline.\nIf you like the sound of waves crashing against rocky shores this is the place for you:)

365259365.name: Beautiful
365259365.author: a TripAdvisor user
365259365.reviewBody: Sand and rocky outcroppings, restaurants, blue water, boats, and foliage. Like Cabo but laid baxk, quiet, gentler slopes.

364409250.name: Beautiful!
364409250.author: a TripAdvisor user
364409250.reviewBody: Great place to visit in Mexico! Natural beauty! Best place I have been in Mexico so far. Can\'t wait to go back!

363404587.name: Huatulco Bay tour
363404587.author: a TripAdvisor user
363404587.reviewBody: excellent tour, you can swim in a unspoiled beach, eat very fresh sea food (but expensive) and have a nice views.

362400921.name: fresh air-paradise
362400921.author: a TripAdvisor user
362400921.reviewBody: Love the place amazing views of the mountains, hotels, and ocean. Fresh air just come down put your feet up and enjoy.

362170772.name: Gorgeous Beach
362170772.author: a TripAdvisor user
362170772.reviewBody: Stunning, must take a walk in the midday in order to avoid sand fleas at dawn or dusk- really pretty and clean too.

361542337.name: Beautiful beach
361542337.author: a TripAdvisor user
361542337.reviewBody: Beautiful beach and the beach huts were very nice. It was so hot we didn\'t spend a lot of time on the beach.

359834113.name: Snorkeling
359834113.author: a TripAdvisor user
359834113.reviewBody: All the bays are great for snorkeling. Plenty of sea animals to see, bring your underwater camera. Visit trip advisor Pilo Velsquez he\'a amazing and take a tour, fishing, whale watching, see dolphins, snorkel, have lunch at one of the bays it amazing

359494400.name: Beautiful swimming
359494400.author: a TripAdvisor user
359494400.reviewBody: Enjoyed the mild waves and the warm Pacific Ocean.  Enjoyed snorkeling.  The beaches were clean and well kept.

357592646.name: Stunning scenery
357592646.author: a TripAdvisor user
357592646.reviewBody: A beautiful Bay amongst many. The Bay has an amazing view and appears almost untouched by people. Worth the visit.

356743835.name: The staff and natural beauty of this destination really makes it a vacation of a lifetime
356743835.author: a TripAdvisor user
356743835.reviewBody: There aren\'t enough positive adjectives in the English language to describe this trip. Atmosphere is relaxed, beautiful scenery, the best staff ever, food so yummy especially the breakfast options,exceptional service, so clean, many activity options and the spa treatments are so good.\n

356532701.name: The friendly locals. Incredible staff
356532701.author: a TripAdvisor user
356532701.reviewBody: I have to say we have traveled all over, this place is number 1... We will be back again very soon. There was not a staff member I can not say was nothing better then 100%. I have a special thanks to Samuel Prudencio. He was one of the nicest man. He went above a beyond his job to make us feel welcome and comfortable. I would also like to,say, the cleaning was immaculate. I have a very special thank you to a man we will not say is like family. He is a local cab driver Noe Lopez. He showed us so much. Places that only the locals know about. His English was good. I will hire him every time I am there as his rates we half. I don\'t like big tours this was perfect for us. You get to see the real Mexico this way. We also spent days on mission work helping family\'s. Our few hundred dollars feeds a lot of people.

356174949.name: Stunning
356174949.author: a TripAdvisor user
356174949.reviewBody: We would walk up and down the bay everyday.  Nice calming walk and fun to see the shells and smell the ocean.

355157577.name: Gorgeous place
355157577.author: a TripAdvisor user
355157577.reviewBody: If you have not considered Huatulco for your trip to Mexico you are missing out! One thing I liked about it was the fact that they are a sustainable destination, meaning that everything gets recycled and the hotels treat the water before disposing it.

354908479.name: What a nice day spent!
354908479.author: a TripAdvisor user
354908479.reviewBody: We had a really good time. The boat was playing music as we cruised! We got to spend time relaxing checking out the nice view from the ship. We stopped and got to go snorkelling on one of the beaches and swim at our leisure. The second beach was nice. But I was not impressed with the fact that as soon as we got off the boat we were escorted to a particular restaurant and basically we had no choice where to eat! The staff was very pushy. We made the best of the experience tho and still had a nice time swimming and enjoying the beautiful sun!

354455488.name: Best day of vacation - Site seeing snorkelling.
354455488.author: a TripAdvisor user
354455488.reviewBody: Highly recommend Roberto . Just my wife and me went and had a great day . Saw dolphins , sea turtles and a whale which was awesome. Went snorkling in three different locations and Robert joined us .Next trip will go out fishing as well.

354148702.name: Amazing sunrise and beautiful beaches
354148702.author: a TripAdvisor user
354148702.reviewBody: Beautiful beaches and bays. Amazing sunrise, worth getting up early to watch it come up, big red ball in the sky.\n

354147589.name: Had a great time at Huatulco Bay
354147589.author: a TripAdvisor user
354147589.reviewBody: Me and my wife had an incredible time at Huatulco Bay, we spent a few days swimming and relaxing on the beautiful beaches there, eating shrimp and fish fillet\'s, the water and sand was exceptional

352564165.name: snorkeling at your leasure
352564165.author: a TripAdvisor user
352564165.reviewBody: my husband would go snorkeling everyday for a small fee and he could see corals, He enjoyed it very much.

351430806.name: Great Snorkeling
351430806.author: a TripAdvisor user
351430806.reviewBody: Took a charter boat to the area and the five of us travelled for a very reasonable cost for an 8 hour tour. There are lots of colourful fish to be seen in the area, clear water to 50-100 feet. We also saw dolphins as well, there are many bays in this area to s[end hours viewing, worth the trip to see

351210781.name: The 7 bay tour was amazing
351210781.author: a TripAdvisor user
351210781.reviewBody: Beautiful scenery all the way. If you were hesitant to snorkel you had the option to be transported to the beach for a beer or soda. I would do this your again on my next visit. Saw dolphins and a whale.

350611076.name: Beautiful
350611076.author: a TripAdvisor user
350611076.reviewBody: One of the cleanest bays we have experienced in our travels. We took the 7 bay snorkelling tour which was a good time. We did some snorkelling in one of the bays and were pleasantly surprised to see they take great care of the coral reefs and surrounding ecology. In another bay we stopped for lunch and had the best meal of the week. It was a pineapple sliced in half, filled with shrimp in an almost alfredo sauce, covered in cheese and then baked in an oven. Absolutely delicious. On the return trip we saw 5 very large sea turtles about 3 miles off shore and had to be very careful not to hit any of them. I\'d recommend this tour highly.

350344290.name: Amazing resort, superb staff
350344290.author: a TripAdvisor user
350344290.reviewBody: We keep returning to Huatulco, Secrets. This place is 6 star. The staff under the watchful eye of Angelica Agnon re amazing. The resort is immaculate, food to die for. We have recommended this resort to a lot of friends and family, feel like an envoy. Deserves 100%

350008625.name: Beautiful place
350008625.author: a TripAdvisor user
350008625.reviewBody: I love this place and would definitely go back to visit again, the nature and the food are the greatest.

349502015.name: Beautiful
349502015.author: a TripAdvisor user
349502015.reviewBody: Went out on Pacific in catamaran with 25 people plus crew.  Absolutely beautiful.  Visited the various bays, got to snorkel, swim, and eat at local restaurant.  Saw 3 whales, OMG!  Downside, local restaurant was questionable and very bad downside ran out of gas in the catamaran on the way back to the marina.  Had to call for help meanwhile we are sitting/rocking in the heat.  Would still recommend!

349454309.name: Breathtaking......so relaxing
349454309.author: a TripAdvisor user
349454309.reviewBody: Don\'t miss it. Great way to end your day at the pool. Must see during the daylight hours as well. Can\'t wait to go back.

348046154.name: Beautiful
348046154.author: a TripAdvisor user
348046154.reviewBody: It was beautiful, warm water clear, but a little rough on windy days.  Saw fish around rocks at dreams beach. So scenic, especially at dusk and dawn.

345070713.name: Beautiful area
345070713.author: a TripAdvisor user
345070713.reviewBody: Loved this area, beautiful landscape and not overly commercialized. The people are amazing as well. So much culture and history in the area.

345039185.name: Check out Fisherman Gregoria Sanchez.  Saw lots of dolphins and sea turtles.
345039185.author: a TripAdvisor user
345039185.reviewBody: Check out Fisherman Gregoria Sanchez.  Saw lots of dolphins and sea turtles.  Beautiful sunrises every morning.

344794417.name: Lovely place
344794417.author: a TripAdvisor user
344794417.reviewBody: What a beautiful place to visit.  Lovely beaches!  I want to go back sometime.  We stayed at an all inclusive hotel, but hope to find a nice rental next time.

344090966.name: Beautiful location, nice peopld and lots to see and do.
344090966.author: a TripAdvisor user
344090966.reviewBody: We found Huatulco to be a really diamond of a vacation location!  A taxi to anywhere is 25 pesos and available everywhere. The beaches are the best in the world. Excursions are available to beautiful waterfalls in the mountains, ship tours to the different bays and beaches in the area, or road trips to some of the more distant less visited beaches (nude only if so inclined). Eco focused tours take you to game reserves and various Con-ops that now work hard at preserving this natural wonder of a place.  I would go back in a minute!

343579962.name: Best place to relax. Better than Cancun!
343579962.author: a TripAdvisor user
343579962.reviewBody:
Great town, people, clean town and beaches! 

Amazing views, not expensive with delicious food.

Tons of things to do!

343426550.name: Tour of region
343426550.author: a TripAdvisor user
343426550.reviewBody: Beautiful scenery. Clean and well kept. Great for swimmers, beach strollers. National park and attractions very near by.

342700403.name: Very Scenic
342700403.author: a TripAdvisor user
342700403.reviewBody: Very pretty set of nine bays that make up Huatulco area and minimal development on each of them., some still undeveloped Sandy beaches.

342425105.name: Mellow Authentic Mexico
342425105.author: a TripAdvisor user
342425105.reviewBody: Beautiful setting in charming part of Mexico. Perfect location for a winter break. Good snorkeling and swimming, many other activities from boating and fishing to ATV fun.

342396040.name: beautiful
342396040.author: a TripAdvisor user
342396040.reviewBody: Huatulco was an amazing holiday - the locals are very friendly, the weather beautiful, the resort Barcelo was fantastic, the beach so clean and long - the water warm, but in areas rough, snorkling by the rocks was best.  Pools clean and fun, food was good, never a bad meal

341758451.name: Beautiful view but a bit busy sometimes
341758451.author: a TripAdvisor user
341758451.reviewBody: Loved the breaking surf. Easy for anyone except small children, the infirm or the elderly. The water is deliciously warm and super salty - way more than on the California coastline. Not sure why. Clean and clear water make it possible to snorkel right off the beach if you are even a bit experienced. Just watch out for the crazy tourists on jet skis!  Sand is a bit coarser than here in Manitoba where we have powder white sand on our beaches but still give to walk barefoot on except at midday when it gets Hot! Plenty of vendors but quiet and polite and they move on with little resistance if you show no interest. Beaches in Most of Huatulco, like most beaches in Mexico are federally owned and so therefore open to the public. Despite this, even over New Years the water and beach were fairly quiet. Want to go back now!

341729762.name: Beautiful Beaches
341729762.author: a TripAdvisor user
341729762.reviewBody: There was always a life guard on duty. Each day they would put up flag colors that would tell you if it was safe, too windy or no swimming because of jellyfish.

340762624.name: Best little resort town in Mexico!
340762624.author: a TripAdvisor user
340762624.reviewBody: We just got back from huatulco and wishing we didn\'t leave! Everyone who lives and works in the area are so friendly and kind. The weather is hot and sunny almost every day and you can almost count on it.

340080614.name: A recently manufactured resort
340080614.author: a TripAdvisor user
340080614.reviewBody: Because it a recent (1986) development, there are better Pacific coast destinations.  Think Zhiauatenango, Sayulita, even Matzalan (please excuse spelling). This place has small beaches separated by rocky points. One has to taxi everywhere. If you get stuck here, consider Zipolite. Or Puerto Angel. Easy spinning at Puerto Angel.  Difficult at Jipolite.

339964333.name: Rolando is an excellent Boat Guide
339964333.author: a TripAdvisor user
339964333.reviewBody: We have used Rolando several times while in Huatulco for private snorkelling and fishing trips. He sells trips from the main hotel beach. He also speaks excellent English and has a great sense of humour. And he always makes sure his boat trips are safe and relaxing. Rolando is highly recommended if you want a nice pleasant boat trip around Huatulco and surrounding beaches.

339514526.name: Perfect for a getaway.all the little bays in the are,
339514526.author: a TripAdvisor user
339514526.reviewBody: Small Mexican tourist area away from all the crowds of the more popular beaches and resorts. You can take a boat tour of all the bays around the area. We stopped here on our South American cruise, it was a very pleasant area.

338578283.name: Nice weather guaranteed beach
338578283.author: a TripAdvisor user
338578283.reviewBody: This is the best beach in Mexico because it is safe, it is always hot and nice weather. it does not have spring breakers, not discos or big city close, it is only nature, diving, food, beach and great people helping to pass a wonderful vacation

337412375.name: Extremely nice
337412375.author: a TripAdvisor user
337412375.reviewBody: I love spending time and relaxing on the seaside, and the Huatulco bays (there are many!!) are fantastic for sea lovers. You can find nice spots for snorkeling (with plenty of wildlife to enjoy), relax swimming in calm bays, lay on immaculate beaches...this is the ideal sea location for me, since the sea is very calm, but if you look for something more "rough", like waves for surfing, possibly Huatulco is not the right place. But for relaxing, it is just perfect!

336324498.name: Running in Huatulco
336324498.author: a TripAdvisor user
336324498.reviewBody: Yes, it is worth brining your running shoes! I went out every morning around dawn, the only point in the day where the temperature was tolerable. There are wide side walks along the boulevard that parallels the bays that stretches on for more miles than most people would want to try in the tropical heat. The national park area, although very hilly, has some amazing views of the coastline and a chorus of birds .. and again, well paved terrain and a pleasure to run. Give it a go!

335796267.name: Winter interlude and getaway.
335796267.author: a TripAdvisor user
335796267.reviewBody: The water (sea) is warm and clean, and the beach is perfect.  It\'s just the right size to walk there and back from end to end.  The sand itself is what I would call grainy, so no dust in spite of gusty winds - welcome - at times.

335409237.name: Family
335409237.author: a TripAdvisor user
335409237.reviewBody: There are around 8 small bays. It is worth visit them if possible on a private tour so it does not take all day. These are all small beaches you visit very similar to the one your hotel is in maybe. Would not reccomend to eat there unless it looks better than your hotel. I do reccomend to snorkel around because there is a nice coral reef to explore.

335324693.name: my return to Huatulco was just as wonderful
335324693.author: a TripAdvisor user
335324693.reviewBody: really step outside your hotel. and see the area and many many beaches.. rent a car..  a very relaxed.. welcome awaits.. I would go back again and again..  I have my own vehicle there and spent 3 months... touring..

332546786.name: A small piece of heaven
332546786.author: a TripAdvisor user
332546786.reviewBody: Huatulco is a hidden treasure. We absolutely loved our week there and will be back soon. A little piece of Mexico that you will love.

331415407.name: Beaches are not good walking beaches
331415407.author: a TripAdvisor user
331415407.reviewBody: Most of the beaches we went to were on such a big angle, you could not walk very easily on them.  Entrega was the best, but very, very, crowded, and no loungers to lay on anywhere.

331035874.name: Little Paradise
331035874.author: a TripAdvisor user
331035874.reviewBody: This is a great place, the view is awesome. You can swim and relax  or visit the 9 bays that Huatulco have. A place with a must to return.

330857977.name: BEAUTIFUL BAY
330857977.author: a TripAdvisor user
330857977.reviewBody: Bahia de Huatulco, is a beautiful, and pleasant place to visit. Actually, there are several bays in the area: Santa Cruz bay, Tangolunda bay, Conejos bay, Maguey bay, Maguey bay, San Agustin, and other bays. We stayed at Tangolunda bay, at the Park Royal hotel. Nice. Enjoyed it fully. Many excellent small restaurants at La Crucesita. Give it a try.

329238759.name: Relaxing Huatulco
329238759.author: a TripAdvisor user
329238759.reviewBody: If your looking for a place in Mexico to go and feel totally relaxed, then Huatulco Bay is a perfect destination. The beach and water are clean and clear. My wife and I stayed at Dreams and highly recommend the resort as well. We were able to get a boat for a private , snorkel, see dolphin, and for another 20.00 we were able to fish as well. Total for 2 adults was 95.00 and we could stay snorkeling as long as we wanted. We really enjoyed the relaxation in Huatulco the town itself as well.

326780941.name: Exciting vacation destination
326780941.author: a TripAdvisor user
326780941.reviewBody: We stayed Huatulco in a brand new resort befor its official opening.  Swans made of ice, jewelery stores galore, a restful relaxing time for a newly pregnant mom.

326555926.name: Excellent
326555926.author: a TripAdvisor user
326555926.reviewBody: Stayed at the Dreams and it was excellent, good food, drinks and service. Will definitely return again.

326539678.name: Beautiful!!! Such a nice place to take some rest and admire the nature marvels!!
326539678.author: a TripAdvisor user
326539678.reviewBody: Perfect place for snorkeling, have a romantic dinner with your couple, nice hotels and still a not crowded place to visit

326101449.name: Huatulco is so Beautifu!
326101449.author: a TripAdvisor user
326101449.reviewBody: I loved waking up each morning to the beauty. This place is so private and I hope they do not build up around it. I felt very safe and relaxed.

325775443.name: Nothing like it!
325775443.author: a TripAdvisor user
325775443.reviewBody: Huatulco is hands-down, the best place to vacation!  Beautiful, friendly, safe....nothing out there like it! :)

325288903.name: Paradise!
325288903.author: a TripAdvisor user
325288903.reviewBody: The bay and private beach was a little slice of heaven.  There was no vendors pressuring you into buying trinkets and souvenirs and the beach was very quiet and peaceful.  The sand can however get EXTREMELY hot in the afternoon sun, so it is best to take a pair of shoes to walk down to the water.

324739519.name: Stunning, breathtaking
324739519.author: a TripAdvisor user
324739519.reviewBody: Highly recommended to anyone looking for a feast for the eyes.  The rockformations are amazing, the surf is big and makes for great relaxation on the beach.

324726797.name: Hidden Gem of Southern Mexico
324726797.author: a TripAdvisor user
324726797.reviewBody: Huatulco is a wonderful place to visit. Such a great change of pace from the big touristy places further north. Its far enough south that there is much less tourism activity, which in my mind is great. I like to experience authentic Mexican culture so Huatulco is great. We rented paddle boards and ran across the bay a couple times. On the far side is a great little beach with a cantina you can just walk right up to for a drink. \n\nIf Mexico is on your agenda, head for Huatulco.

322671036.name: one day cruise stop in huatulco, mexico
322671036.author: a TripAdvisor user
322671036.reviewBody: right at the pier there is a very nice beach with some shops and places to eat. you can also take a taxi to Las Crucecitas which is 2-3 miles away or just walk there using the nice wide sidewalks. you can see the town in a couple of hours and have lunch at several places.

318931641.name: Best experience!
318931641.author: a TripAdvisor user
318931641.reviewBody: Long beautiful walk on a trail up a mountain of forest. Smells of  coffee beans, sounds of streams & water falls. The most beautiful fun experience of my life

314468093.name: Cant wait to go back
314468093.author: a TripAdvisor user
314468093.reviewBody: The side trips to the coffee plantations and an overall tour of the area is a must do.  We brought home the best coffee we have ever had and the tour gave us our bearings on shopping and local restaurants.  Food at the resort was so-so but there was no lack of things to do.  Loved it!!

313991934.name: Great way to celebrate Christmas-more pricey but worth it!
313991934.author: a TripAdvisor user
313991934.reviewBody: We had a great family holiday-weather is guaranteed, lots for teenagers to do, food and celebrations were next to nine.  Highly recommend going.

313817567.name: Outdoors Only
313817567.author: a TripAdvisor user
313817567.reviewBody: If you are not an outdoor sports enthusiast there won\'t be much to do and to see.  Some cute stores but too many vendors trying to get  you to their store.  It was a stop on our cruise so it was OK but I would not go out of my way to go there

312919555.name: Quiet Town
312919555.author: a TripAdvisor user
312919555.reviewBody: People are friendly. Not so much to see but it feels like a good place to relax. Nice bargain as well nearby downtown. Food is great.

310559207.name: Huatulco was a quiet little town.
310559207.author: a TripAdvisor user
310559207.reviewBody: The best thing about flying into Huatulco, NO LINES!!!  Loved the airport because I believe we were the only big resort (Secrets) in Huatulco.  Loved the little town, felt safe all the time.  The beach at the hotel was very rocky.  No soft white sand, so we basically stayed at the pool.

307537855.name: Every resort should be like Huatulco
307537855.author: a TripAdvisor user
307537855.reviewBody: It is great to see how well planned is Huatulco development and how nature is being conserved. Beaches are beautiful.

306975933.name: IL PARAISO
306975933.author: a TripAdvisor user
306975933.reviewBody: I went to fish BIG GAME, merlin, dorado and whatever.   Sea was angry that day, but we faced the waves without hesitation and caught more that our share on a 4 hour voyage deep sea\n\'Mar profundo" the sea condition was called.

303855335.name: One of the best mexican well preserved paradises!
303855335.author: a TripAdvisor user
303855335.reviewBody: Huatulco bays are those few places in Mexico that have been preserved from massive tourism. Local people have made a big effort to offer good, affordable and gentle service for tourists, the only rule is to have respect for them and for the environment. You could have a great week visiting every beach in here!

299706877.name: Safe and Lovely
299706877.author: a TripAdvisor user
299706877.reviewBody: Stayed there for a week with our family. We were impressed with the lovely beaches and how easy it was to walk around and take public transportation.

299385900.name: Great beach and wonderful scenary.
299385900.author: a TripAdvisor user
299385900.reviewBody: The beach is beautiful, the water is clean, and the waves are generally manageable for regular activities. There are usually jet skis for rent.

298863871.name: beautiful warm waters with no one in site....Mexico\'s secret
298863871.author: a TripAdvisor user
298863871.reviewBody: One of my if not my favorite travel destinations in Mexico. The 8 or 9 bays are incredible and mostly deserted.  Mostly a Latino vacation destination.....I guess they want to keep it a secret

295412887.name: Great Visit
295412887.author: a TripAdvisor user
295412887.reviewBody: Great place to stay, very friendly staff and great city to visit....very safe. Spent the day touring without any hassle\n\n

293184863.name: Boat ride on the bay!
293184863.author: a TripAdvisor user
293184863.reviewBody: Had a wonderful time snorkeling.  Sights were beautiful as well as the warm Pacific Ocean waters!  A must do!

292672082.name: It is WELL worth it.
292672082.author: a TripAdvisor user
292672082.reviewBody: The view . Its breath taking. We saw whales,  we saw dolphins.\nThe eating and shopping are great and especially the View.\nJust a beautiful place

292467042.name: Wow!
292467042.author: a TripAdvisor user
292467042.reviewBody: Very beautiful well worth the visit, had a great time was there for a wedding with family and friends. Very hot and dry bring lots of sun screen you will need it. Also in December the no- see-ums are out so you will need lots of bug spray, they are everywhere and not just on the beach. You will look down and your legs will be covered in bites not nice.

292153411.name: 36 beaches
292153411.author: a TripAdvisor user
292153411.reviewBody: Nice beaches. Some are crowded, some are vacant. Do some research ahead of time to find the best one for you.

289850382.name: Beautiful - like everywhere in Huatulco
289850382.author: a TripAdvisor user
289850382.reviewBody: Just one of the beautiful, clean and prestine locations in Huatulco.  We visited about 6 of the different beaches and about 5 bays.  The water is warm and the sand is like cornmeal.  Can\'t wait to go back.

289392698.name: Huatulco, Mecico
289392698.author: a TripAdvisor user
289392698.reviewBody: Not a big fan of Mexico, but visited Haultulco as part of a Panama Canal cruise and I gotta say it was a very nice place!! People are friendly and the town is very clean. \n

288151872.name: birthday/vacation trip
288151872.author: a TripAdvisor user
288151872.reviewBody: loved it the beaches are awesome , hotel is excellent and restaurant has avariety of foods  climate is amazing and all the trips to the coffee and falls are breath taking

285654064.name: Great beach destimation
285654064.author: a TripAdvisor user
285654064.reviewBody:
We just returned from our family vacations in Huatulco; it is a beautiful place.  It's full of vegetation, fun tours, and it's totally family friendly.   All the people there strive to provide you with great customer service.  Huatulco Is extremely safe and clean.  They even pride on having one of the best recycling systems in Mexico.

This is totally a destination you would not want to miss.

285336362.name: Something for everyone
285336362.author: a TripAdvisor user
285336362.reviewBody: This was our first time visiting Huatulco Mexico.  The three things we enjoyed most about the area was that the weather is very good.  Not as much rain and for the most part is dependable. I don\'t want to go somewhere and find out later thats its known for its unpredictablity weatherwise.  The people are incredibly friendly.  WE booked a private cruise to take us to the bays and this really is a must see if you are going to be visitng this area.  White sandy beaches, warm water and really great snorkelling.  We brought our own snorkels etc but we didn\'t have to...all the tour guide businesses supply you with equipment.  ONe thing I would recommend is that you bring your own lunch from where you are staying.  They will package you up a lunch for around 7$-$9.....much cheaper than allowing your tour guide to take you to the overinflated restaurants on the various beaches.  IT cost us $16 for pineapple juice in the shell of the pineapple. Thats ridiculous.  I didn\'t bother looking at the price because normally everything is fairly reasonable...but the tour guides make a profit from their friends that own these businesses so just be aware of this before you go and make it clear to them that you either want to chose where you are going to eat (check out the prices ) or you will bring your own picnic lunch.  Other than that we loved our vacation and can\'t wait to get back and enjoy this gem of an area another time!  :)

285177020.name: Beautiful, beautiful!
285177020.author: a TripAdvisor user
285177020.reviewBody: Our cruise ship pulled into the small enclosed harbour and we disembarked, only to quickly return to get out bathers and towels. \nA beautiful swimming beach lay invitingly at the end of the pier and so we plunged in to the clear cooling waters.\nIt was unexpectedly amazing so we spent the day alternating between the beachside eateries and the cool Pacific. No need to do anything else in this port.

284605631.name: Disappointing stay at the Barcelo
284605631.author: a TripAdvisor user
284605631.reviewBody: Winter of 2014 we went to Huatulco for the first time. We liked that it is not very commercialized yet and that the weather is generally very good. Unfortunately we had many troubles with our Resort the Barcelona. Rated as a 4 Star hotel it might have been a 2. Paint chipping off and falling in the bathroom,  mold and mildo in the bathroom. Rom cleaning was at different times each day and some days you could not get back into your room until 5 PM, even thought the room was empty since early AM would not stay at the Barcelona again but Huatulco again but at. Different resort.

284349770.name: Huatulco Ba
284349770.author: a TripAdvisor user
284349770.reviewBody: Beautiful snorkeling here.  It wasn\'t too crowded which made it more enjoyable.  Waves can be rough at times.  Be aware there are nude beaches around

283352071.name: LOVE Huatulco
283352071.author: a TripAdvisor user
283352071.reviewBody: Huatulco is a fairly unknown gem in Mexico.  We stayed a the Barcel\u00f3 Huatulco resort and found it to be very nice.  We did have an issue with the shower in our room but it didn\'t detract from the great time we had.  The entire staff was great, very personable and attentive.  Our Chamber Maid was fantastic and took great care of us and our room.  There was never a time when any of the staff expected a tip, even though it is included in the cost of the resort, I never felt pressured.  My only complaint is that those people walking around that appeared to be either supervisors or management never engaged with the guests.  I would think they would like to know how guests are enjoying the resort or if there are issues.  They would continually walk by us and never stop and even acknowledge we were there.  Other than that, the resort is great.

282228635.name: Hot Weather Holiday
282228635.author: a TripAdvisor user
282228635.reviewBody: We have been to Huatulco twice now and have yet to see a cloud. A great hot weather destination. We love to take the catamaran tour and visit the small village, but mostly stick around the all inclusive hotel and beach.

277709251.name: Beautiful beaches, people and food!
277709251.author: a TripAdvisor user
277709251.reviewBody: Beautiful spot on the west coast of Oaxaca that everyone should see! I can\'t wait to return...it\'s stunning.

275474292.name: Beautiful
275474292.author: a TripAdvisor user
275474292.reviewBody: Loved snorkeling and lunch on the beach - there were people selling things on the beach but not aggressively / nothing to dislike

275051246.name: Awesome
275051246.author: a TripAdvisor user
275051246.reviewBody: Third visit to Huatulco. Definitely one of our favorite places. Temperature is great-nice and hot and sunny. People are friendly. Area is safe. Definitely a place to visit.

274541463.name: Beautiful Beach
274541463.author: a TripAdvisor user
274541463.reviewBody: Huatulco has the most beautiful beach with an abundance of wonderful food choices.  It is nice for swimming and snorkeling. Arriving is simple.  Take one of the local taxi\'s to the area from the cruise ship port.  The driver will make arrangements to pick you up at a designated time.  Do it on your own rather than through a cruise ship, for the best deal!  It is one of our favorite spots in all of Mexico!

274539285.name: Beautiful
274539285.author: a TripAdvisor user
274539285.reviewBody: The Bays are beautiful teeming with life. Beautiful sunsets, lots of fish and even some jellyfish on the shoreline. The people and the town are quite the attraction.

272410769.name: wrong time of year
272410769.author: a TripAdvisor user
272410769.reviewBody: The surf was very high this time of year so we didn\'t get to enjoy the bay.  The ocean was beautiful and the bay tour was good but the waves were pretty high.

270666048.name: Port stop on Oceania Regatta
270666048.author: a TripAdvisor user
270666048.reviewBody:
We did a scenic drive and saw some beautiful country. The port is very simple but pleasant. The US Coast Guard was in port while were there. 

Dan and Phyllis
Denver, CO

270576363.name: Arturo Martinez, Huatulco Tours
270576363.author: a TripAdvisor user
270576363.reviewBody:
Before starting my cruise, I read about this tour operator, in Trip Advisor. I booked him by E-Mail,and I landed in Huatulco, with another couple of fellow cruisers.
 Arturo surpassed my expectations, and I got praised from my fellow cruisers, one Canadian and one English couples, for booking the tour with Arturo.
He is knowledgeable, caring, and he goes well beyond his duties, to please his customers.Kudos.
Arturomartinez16@hotmail.com
Nestor Kleer, Ann Arbor, MI

267575714.name: Loved our bay tour !
267575714.author: a TripAdvisor user
267575714.reviewBody: We did a private Panga boat tour & our driver Jorge took us by all the Bays. All were so beautiful...white sand beaches....some were great for snorkeling too. We saw the Blow Hole too which sprayed huge amounts of water. We traveled all the way to San Augustin and along the way we fished & caught some Bonita. Also saw turtles...dolphins & a sail fish. The bay tour was the highlight of our trip...so much so that we did the same tour twice!

263148898.name: Beautiful view
263148898.author: a TripAdvisor user
263148898.reviewBody: We loved the view , completely amazing time we had . People are very friendly and the hospitality in the are was very good .

263100468.name: Beautiful area
263100468.author: a TripAdvisor user
263100468.reviewBody: This is a great place to travel by boat and visit the various bays - see Tony on the beach.  He will take care of you.

262003432.name: Beautiful place
262003432.author: a TripAdvisor user
262003432.reviewBody: Beautiful beaches, quiet place, beautiful nature, clean sea. The fishes swim at your feet. Good hotels.

261301678.name: Bay Tour
261301678.author: a TripAdvisor user
261301678.reviewBody: The bay tour is excelent and the snorkling was increadible. Go early in your trip to get the lay of the land for the whole area.Great person for Bat tours and fishing Eduardo Valle Garcia

259662160.name: Best Bay!
259662160.author: a TripAdvisor user
259662160.reviewBody: Loved our visit here! So tranquil, peaceful, clean and pristine. Enjoyed it thoroughly, will go back again.  Best place for a romantic vacation.

259121129.name: \u201cBay Tour with Teko on the Marisol
259121129.author: a TripAdvisor user
259121129.reviewBody: We went with two other couples on Feb 5, 2015.  Teko was an amazing tour guide and captain!!!  We saw lots of dolphins, Whales, Sea Turtles and Sting Rays.  He took us snorkelling at two of the bays and we saw so many fish.  Teko would dive down and bring us back puffer fish, sea spiders and all sorts of interesting things to see!  The beer was cold and the company was great!!!  Was a highlight of our trip.  Highly recommend this to anyone who wants to have fun!!!!!

258481288.name: Excellent
258481288.author: a TripAdvisor user
258481288.reviewBody: Love the weather, and the people!  We have stayed at the Gala (now Dreams)\' and Las Brisas.  We loved all three hotels because we love Huatulco.  It feels safe, and and away from the rif-raf of a big city.  We love it as the people are friendly, and the area is well taken care of.  We can\'t walt to go every year.

258434710.name: Very beautiful
258434710.author: a TripAdvisor user
258434710.reviewBody: Interesting and very peaceful.  Worth going on the tour. Very informative tour guides. Interesting history.

258373062.name: Saw whales on boat tour of bay!
258373062.author: a TripAdvisor user
258373062.reviewBody: the bays are all beautiful - you will enjoy the boat tour to explore them.  The locals are proud of their shoreline and with good reason.  \nWe happened to see a humpback whale and her baby while on the tour - very exciting to see!

257956021.name: Went yesterday
257956021.author: a TripAdvisor user
257956021.reviewBody: This bay is unspoiled. We went here on a tour of all seven bays.  The sad is hard and makes for an easy entry and exit to the clear blue water. Hualtuco is the worlds best kept secret

257885143.name: Best of Huatulco
257885143.author: a TripAdvisor user
257885143.reviewBody: If your looking for a private tour look no further. Adelino Olea is the one to book with. Great private tour, on time and very professional. One of the highlights was the Church which is a must see. Impressed with the history and would highly recommend touring with Olea.

257702180.name: Beautiful bay
257702180.author: a TripAdvisor user
257702180.reviewBody: Beautiful bay, stopped here on our NCL Miami-to-LA cruise and definitely enjoyed the view. We took a ship tour land-and-sea and saw a little of the area on land, then on a catamaran to look over the bays in the area. The entire area seemed minimally populated, but I think it has great potential to be a tourist hot spot in the future.

257681462.name: Prisitine
257681462.author: a TripAdvisor user
257681462.reviewBody: Virgin Coves great sailing. The water is warm and blue. There is always a noce breeze to keep you cool

255499032.name: amazing beach
255499032.author: a TripAdvisor user
255499032.reviewBody: Beaches are clean and easy to access. Hidden gem in Mexico. Breathing sunrises and sunsets highlight the area. Homemade wares for sale nearby. Beaches are easy to walk on to look for shells and other treasures. Have fun good luck.

255109816.name: Must do!
255109816.author: a TripAdvisor user
255109816.reviewBody: You must see all the beautiful bays.  The snorkelling is unreal!  Take some candy with you as part of the bay tours, you make a stop in St.Augustine.  The children love to get American candies:)

254532657.name: Amazed at his community
254532657.author: a TripAdvisor user
254532657.reviewBody: so very clean and beautifully landscapped. Then a trip to the river for a rafting experience. We loved our guide, he was funny and knowledgable, but only in Spanish!! His old bus needs a new battery, but he was realiable and picked us up after 5 hours to get  us back on the Norwegian Star as promised.

254509247.name: huatulco bay
254509247.author: a TripAdvisor user
254509247.reviewBody: The beach is clean and beautiful.  Sunrises and sun sets are wonderful. Very clean beaches,\neasy to walk for seniors, and would return again.

254152017.name: Mahi Mahi Fishing Adventures - Boating experience
254152017.author: a TripAdvisor user
254152017.reviewBody: My husband and I visited Huatulco for the first time at the end of January.  Gregorio Sanchez was recommended to us so we arranged for a half day boat tour. He took us out to see dolphins, sea turtles, and as a bonus, my husband did some fishing. We saw a blue marlin and landed a sail fish.  What an incredible experience! Then we went snorkelling and had a delicious lunch at Maguey Beach.  We had such a great day that we booked again for the next week when our daughters were going to be in Huatulco. We travelled to La India and San Augustin (beautiful beaches, great snorkelling) and got to see sting rays jumping just for the fun of it.  All in all we truly enjoyed our time on the ocean and would highly recommend Gregorio at Mahi Mahi Fishing Adventures as a guide.

253583696.name: Beauty for all
253583696.author: a TripAdvisor user
253583696.reviewBody:
This was an amazing trip, I travelled by myself and am so grateful that I did. The people were amazing and the food was so delicious, I would travel to the area again in a hearbeat.

Huatulco is a safe place for the single travellor.

252442593.name: Plenty to do here!
252442593.author: a TripAdvisor user
252442593.reviewBody: Lots of shops both touristy for the big hotel boats, but also nice shops for jewelry, art, clothing.\nPlenty of fishing and cruiser boats to take you out for whatever you want.\nGreat little sea side church and village area.

251452334.name: Hire a private fisherman for touring
251452334.author: a TripAdvisor user
251452334.reviewBody: Right on beach are wonderful fishermen who will take your group of 1-10 (recommend under 7) out to fish, snorkel, bay tour, look for dolphins, whales and sea turtles.  You custom your trip based on your interests

251009791.name: Another wonderful stay!
251009791.author: a TripAdvisor user
251009791.reviewBody: We have just returned from the Barcelo Huatulco hotel January 06th - January 20th 2015.\nThis is our 7th time and we had yet another wonderful stay. Firstly many thanks to all the wonderful staff who looked after us so well all of them work so very hard to ensure we all have a truly wonderful vacation. Our sincere thanks go out to Fernanda who sorted our room out for us and made all our requests for our vacation thank you so much! To Mr Rafael who took Great Care of us with all the extras that really made our holiday, thank you again! And Elvira Janeth Victoria for all on reception thank you for your kind attention. Thank to Edgar in the Do\u00f1a Rosa restaurant for always looking after us so well again along with Jenny and Julie and all the waiters. Big thanks to our Spanish teacher Javier Pacheco in the Club Premier room and to Celso and Miguel for nightly nap cap drinks! The guys at the beach restaurant always doing a great job no matter how busy there are and it does get busy at peak lunch times.Thank you to Fernando and Marshall looking after us with our drinks on the beach excellent service! The entertainment staff great shows and to all the staff for a superb BBQ at the end of our vacation thank you to Jesus a lot of work goes into arranging the BBQ ...thank you!! And big thanks to our maid who was excellent Rosamaria thank you for keeping our room so nice, we were not in the new decor rooms but everything worked well and was very clean! Had some great fishing this year 2 nice sailfish and a nice Dorado ask for Concepion at the beach the only guy with a Roots bag! He is an excellent fisherman. We had some good friends join us the second week and enjoyed some nice dinners together and lots of fun at the beach.The food was very good at the hotel this year some people had different ideas this hotel works for us but if your looking for a 5 star hotel then this is not for you however if your looking for great weather and a nice relaxing vacation then this is the place for you. James and Javier from Sunwing please make sure we have the nice big coach next year and not the smaller coach ha ha James hope your daughter gets on well wish her good luck from us and we will see you all next year thanks again to everyone for a really wonderful holiday. Miguel & Lena.

250923197.name: Lovely long walk by the water
250923197.author: a TripAdvisor user
250923197.reviewBody: Plenty of funky sculptures and entertainers, sea smell and cold bier. Also, noisy, touristy, trashy, lots of bugs. I think once is more than enough.

250684938.name: qaint
250684938.author: a TripAdvisor user
250684938.reviewBody: Not much to be said about this little town apart from the square,where you\'ll find most activity,,pretty llittle sq with the most beautiful interior ceiling murals within this lovely church ..shops and bars and thats about it . We visitid by cruise port,,you can grab a taxi or take a walk into the town itself,,,a new walkway is being built which should cut down the walking time...if your looking for a destination to discover this lovely coastline,,,,there were plenty of hotels popping up ,so i,m sure it could be a lovely port in a few yrs,,,,but just didnt tick many boxes for us this time

250267220.name: Why have we never heard of this place before?
250267220.author: a TripAdvisor user
250267220.reviewBody: How I loved this little town. Beautiful beaches and bays and wonderfully friendly and interesting people. So impressed with their ecological efforts and with their collective desire to be a vacation wonderland that puts the environment front and centre. We toured a number of bays by Catamaran and received a wealth of information from our guide. Will definitely be returning to this little gem of a place.

249887793.name: Great place far away from everything
249887793.author: a TripAdvisor user
249887793.reviewBody:
Bahías de Huatulco is a place gorgeous with everything (bays, beaches, little malls, hotels, ATM, etc.). It's located in Oaxaca, Mexico. To arrive there you can travel by plane or bus, the airport is 15 min from it and travel by bus you can take around 15 hours (a long trip, but it's worth it).
It has nine bays, in some of them, you can arrive walking, boating or taking taxi.
It's a clean place and most of the people is friendly.
I invite you to know this heavenly place.

249727547.name: Fishing
249727547.author: a TripAdvisor user
249727547.reviewBody: Yesterday we went fishing with Crisanto Carmona. Besides the fact that he speaks good english, he was a very courteous and considerate boat captain. I have fished all over the world,so I know a good captain when I fish with him. Crisanto was excellent. We did very well in particular with a big sailfish.

249705278.name: Wonderful Bay
249705278.author: a TripAdvisor user
249705278.reviewBody: Love the fact that the Bay is eco friendly so the sewers do NOT go into the sea as in many other tropical destinations.  In fact, they appear to be recycling and being very careful to process their sewage and garbage.  Totally different than the Caribean and other places.

249345479.name: europcar rental
249345479.author: a TripAdvisor user
249345479.reviewBody: I would never use this company as a car rental if you are looking to rent.  They do not provide cars even if you have a confirmation #.  Avis and Hertz are much more reliable.  I just spent 17 days there with no car. When I booked with them back in September.  Stay away from this company.

248358869.name: Huatulco\'s 9 Bays of Excitement
248358869.author: a TripAdvisor user
248358869.reviewBody: There is not enough time in one day to see all of the beauty in these bays. Every Dive will be different and unique. Make sure you join the Huatulco Dive Center for an unforgettable trip.

247358839.name: Awesome sites
247358839.author: a TripAdvisor user
247358839.reviewBody: You can\'t beat the scenery...We couldn\'t get enough of it. Take a fishing tour and try your luck or go snorkeling; both are worth the extra money.

246820367.name: NOT A LOT TO COMMEND THIS TOWN
246820367.author: a TripAdvisor user
246820367.reviewBody: Dreary place, halfway between nowhere and nowhere.  A bit of sand, a lot of white painted concrete, and not much else apart from the usual tourist tat.

245699356.name: Crocs and Turtles Tour
245699356.author: a TripAdvisor user
245699356.reviewBody:
Booked via Air Canada rep (Agni!!) at Las Brisas

This was out favorite tour. I am ashamed to say I do not remember the guides names as it has been over a month but the tour was amazing. First of all my partner and I love wildlife so anything related is bound to be a hit for us.
The crocodile lagoon/reserve was beautiful and our tour guide was very passionate and it definitely rubbed off on us. He explained how hard the people of the village work to protect and maintain the area and the challenges they face. He takes you on a small boat (that he paddles) to a small island rampant with big beautiful iguanas! The guide takes you to various enclosures of animals that they are rehabilitating or some which were rescued and are unable to be released. It was very humbling to see all of the projects they are working on. 
The turtle sanctuary was amazing, a bit sad to see the turtles in small enclosures however some were being raised or rescued to be re-released. It is also important to note that due to the hurricane they were still rebuilding and many tanks/enclosures were temporary. 
Stopped at a cosmetic factory (?) that was started by the woman that owns the Body shop. She helped to teach the locals how to make environmentally friendly cosmetics. Did a small tour and picked up some gifts/souvenirs. 
On the way back we stopped at two beaches. One of Mexico's only nudist beach, beautiful whether you are into it or not. The second beach we stopped at (I cant remember the name) was beautiful, great snorkeling, great food. 
Overall this was probably our favorite excursion. Very affordable considering how much we saw and the trip took all day. 
The guide for the entire tour was very friendly, spoke excellent English and was very informative. Would not hesitate to take another tour with him. Agni at Las Brisas would know his name.

245106640.name: Beautiful
245106640.author: a TripAdvisor user
245106640.reviewBody: Perfect weather, beautiful views, great beach to walk, but sand fleas eat you up.  I don\'t think I would go again.

244722310.name: Best place in Mexico
244722310.author: a TripAdvisor user
244722310.reviewBody: This town is so new to the tourist ring!  It still has lots of virgin beaches in it 9 bays and the locals are so friendly to foreigners.  Cant wait to go back!

244577581.name: Actually 9 bays
244577581.author: a TripAdvisor user
244577581.reviewBody: this is where Mexicans come to vacation. The Beaches are very nice with fine sand and cleans. Reminds me of places in Greece with the cliffs and white painted houses.

244331985.name: Best Bay in the World
244331985.author: a TripAdvisor user
244331985.reviewBody: This bay offers crystal clear waters and pristine beaches. However the access to the beach seems to be dominated by Secrets hotel, which we stayed at and loved. However if you are staying at another hotel I think you can get a boat the beach or walk down a path to get to it. The beach is not private and you have a right to be on it. Also the bay has many many fish that are beautiful so get a snorkel set.

243259446.name: \u201cHuatulco with Arturo Martinez\u201d
243259446.author: a TripAdvisor user
243259446.reviewBody: We stopped in Huatulco with the NCL Star on November 8, 2014.  We had previous booked a tour with Arturo Martinez (reviewed separately).  The town of Huatulco is beautiful and completely unspoiled by tourism. The people were very friendly and the beach is lovely.  I have recommended this as a vacation spot to several friends.

243208872.name: Spectacular Views
243208872.author: a TripAdvisor user
243208872.reviewBody: We took a trip to the beach from our cruise ship.  It was a short taxi ride through some beautiful areas.  The beach was beautiful and the views were spectacular.  If you like beaches this is the place to spend the day.

243082970.name: Relax and enjoy
243082970.author: a TripAdvisor user
243082970.reviewBody: The sandy beach and warm water has a remarkable feeling in your body, you will experience Goosebumps in your skin and dream a paradise forever. It has to be one of the spots in our planet classified as paradise.

242760102.name: Yellow Fin/Roberto was a great guide
242760102.author: a TripAdvisor user
242760102.reviewBody:
We spent the day on board a Panga boat with Roberto Hernandez.  It was absolutely more than we could ask for.  My wife and I met him on the beach at Dreams resort on a Saturday and booked a private excursion for most of the day on the following Tuesday.  He picked us up in front of the resort and we drove to his boat in Santa Cruz.  We went out about 5 or  miles and saw at least 50 dolphins during the course of the next hour.  They swam right in front of the boat and you could even touch them if you reached out.  We also saw sea turtles and at least 3 sail fish feeding near the surface of the deep water.

After that we cruised along the shoreline and went to a secluded beach in the national park.  We snorkeled in the bay and later walked the beach which we had to ourselves.
